channel.title: Loading bar (Client Bar) [Pic]
channel.description:
[center]Okay, I have an allstar source , allstar client. I want this loading bar picture is below.[/center] [center][IMG]http://i60.tinypic.com/bduwjn.png[/img][/center]
But here is my loading bar... [center][IMG]http://i62.tinypic.com/296j0ww.png[/img][/center]
Could you help me make my loading bar smaller? Like the first picture please? My contact info:
Skype: VanzShoez
Add me on skype and please help me if you can. Thanks
~ Jake

item.title: Loading bar (Client Bar) [Pic]
item.dc:creator: @ultimatepkvillage ultimatepkvillage
item.description:
@ultimatepkvillage wrote:

Something to do with cache folder, sprites folder. You can see the dimensions of the current loading bar and use a website that will resize it I usually use lunapic.com or just use paint and resize the image to the same size as the previous image.

Read full topic
